Hello! I'm Onyekwere Precious A Frontend Web Designer and Developer

A self-taught frontend web developer from Nigeria since March 2020, graduated from Crawford University, Igbesa Ogun State, Nigeria with a bachelor degrees in Information and Communication technology in 2018.

I am a self motivated person who takes the initiative to learn new things and explore untouched territory.

I try my best to go beyond my limit for the purpose of broadening my horizon because learning never has a limit.
